text: Night of Champions (2011) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view (PPV) show made by WWE. It took place on September 18, 2011, at the First Niagara Center in Buffalo, New York. It was the fifth Night of Champions event held by WWE. It was also the first PPV following the end of WWE's first brand extension. Eight matches happened on the card, six of which were title matches. == Matches == ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Night of Champions website Category:2011 in professional wrestling Category:WWE Night of Champions Category:Sports in Buffalo, New York Category:2011 in New York (state) Category:21st century in Buffalo, New York Category:September events es:WWE Night of Champions#2011
title: Night of Champions (2011)
